basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Phil Ball Endowed Sports Lab Scholarship Fund
basic_information.committee_name: Dr. Phil Ball Endowed Sports Lab Scholarship

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to undergraduate students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are majoring in any field within the Department of Kinesiology and Health Studies Eligibility Requirements Pursuing a degree in the Department of Kinesiology and Health Studies Must be a full-time undergraduate student 3.0 GPA or higher Must have completed PHED 1402, 1432, 1462 Outstanding student within KHS Financial needs considered Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_College is Education and Prof Studies
criteria.raw_text: SIS_College is Education and Prof Studies

criteria.description: SIS_Major is Public Health   or SIS_Major is Kinesiology-Ex/Fitness Mngt   or SIS_Major is Kinesiology-Outdoor & Comm Rec   or SIS_Major is Physical Education/Health   or SIS_Major is Kinesiology-Recreation Mngt   or SIS_Major is Community Health
